A Toronto city councillor today published a motion proposing to restrict false and misleading advertising from oil and gas lobby groups on public transit, DeSmog can report.  The motion recommends that the Toronto Transit Commission, more commonly known as TTC, decline any new ads from the Pathways Alliance and Canada Action, two of Canada’s most […]

The post Toronto Politician Moves to Ban Misleading Fossil Fuel Ads on Transit appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Toronto Politician Moves to Ban Misleading Fossil Fuel Ads on Transit
